inclusion.criterion: elected to undergo either partial or total knee replacement
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: control group of patients free of lower extremity pathology
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: sensory, neurological, or general health conditions that alter perception of the patient's limb in space
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: vestibular disorders will be excluded in order to protect against falls during functional testing
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: unable to understand the questions used to obtain the Knee Society Score
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: minors and prisoners will be excluded from the study
exclusion.label: met

notes: 46-year-old Asian woman with MDD, on anti-depressants for 6 months, but symptoms still present. Has digestive issues recently.
